property.name: aboutText
property.value:
eConference 3.0.2
eConference has been developed by the Collaborative Development Group, Dipartimento di Informatica, University of Bari and it is distributed under the terms of the MIT license. More details on the project homepage at http://cdg.di.uniba.it/projects/econference/ .
This software is based upon the Eclipse Rich Client Platform, http://eclipse.org/rcp/ .
The Jabber plug-in uses the SMACK library, http://www.jivesoftware.org/smack/ .
Eclipse, Built on Eclipse and Eclipse Ready are trademarks of Eclipse Foundation, Inc.
